title: Foreign Language Translation- All Council Areas

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Under the Freedom of Information Act, I would like to request the following information:
Please provide the total amount spent on translation, interpretation, and language services in all areas of council competence for financial years 21/22, 22/23.
Yours faithfully,
Liam Porter

Dear Liam Porter,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Foreign Language
Translation which we received on 01/05/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 31/05/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
